title: You Definitely Have the Talent!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Thanks for waiting! Here’s your mentai monja and special monja!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Way to go, Settsu, you’re getting used to it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah! Helping out at a monjayaki store is a lot of fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>So, do you want to try making them? We offer a special service where staff cook for customers who aren’t too keen on frying monja themselves.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Really? I would love to try that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Okay, Ai will teach you how then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Uwaaah.... Settsu, you’re really good at making them! No one learns that fast, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ehehe, thank you♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>You are so talented in cooking.... But why.... Why does it always turn out....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Eh? Did you say something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, it’s nothing! Ai thinks you have a knack for cooking. So let’s try and brush up on the parts you’re good at!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
